alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 8:49PM CDT until May 24 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... Rum River near St. Francis affecting Anoka County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Minnesota River near Jordan affecting Carver, Scott and Sibley Counties. Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sauk River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Very low roadways may be impacted from Richmond to St. Cloud; water reaching foundations of a few homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 815 PM CDT Saturday, the stage was 6.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 815 PM CDT Saturday was 6.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon and continue falling to 5.2 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 03/27/1957. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
